description.p: You live your life in the service of the stars. You act as an intermediary between them and the mortal world, bringing their messages into this world. Maybe you were a star yourself in the past or wish to become one?

ul.li: Equipment:A moonstone or an onyx, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 20 gp

description.p: Starry Lover are suckers for the stars, night and/or the moon. They mostly sleep during the day and live through the night. Their favourite gem is the moonstone or the onyx. You can imagine what reaction a dagger decorated with moonstones or onyx and star carvings could create?

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I have a weakness for the beautiful night, without clouds of cause.
Saw that twinkling star over there? That's my grandpa.
I may be quiet but so is the night. We are both very mysterious.
If i don't know what to do, i just look at the stars. They will tell me where to go.
Optimistic, that's the word describes me the best.
Some people call me mean, i just call it realistic.
I love the art of the night. Dancing half naked is my passion.
Every full moon, i celebrate like it's my birthday.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Logic. Emotions must not cloud our sense of what is right and true, or our logical thinking. (Lawful)
Charity. I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost. (Good)
Karma. Everthing and everyone has a good and a bad side. I embrace both and build a solid ground in the middle. (Neutral)
Independence. Who needs rules, i make my own. (Chaotic)
Power. If I can attain more power, no even She will tell me what to do. (Evil)
Free. Sometimes i just want to lay down and watch the stars twinkle. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I was dead once, so i make the best out of my second life now.
Somewhere out there waits my dear love for my return, but first i need to get my job done.
I serve the stars with all my power. Spreading their messages all over the world and make it a better place.
Everything i do is for a greater good and i will know what for once i'm done.
Nothing is more important than convincing people to become a Starry Lover too.
Some people made my life very unhappy, i will take revenge on them someday.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I let everyone know that i am something special. Especially those who arn't.
I got serious trust issues.
I can't resist a gem. Those shiny are my nemesis.
I do believe that everyone is less worth than me.
I can't resist beauty... she is always destracting me.
I can't keep secrets and like to talk about anything.

description.p: You feel the most comfortable under the night sky. During the night, as long as you can see stars you have advantage on any orientation related checks. You may even meditate to communicate with the stars to ask them where to go and what to do. Sometime their answers are not that easy to understand.
